title: Chuchel
notes: Epic achievements working. Mouse-only controls. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: CHUCHEL is a comedy adventure game from the creators of Machinarium, Botanicula and Samorost. Help Chuchel to chase down the mysterious villain and retrieve his cherished cherry! The reward? A hearty situational humor, wild music and hilarious animations that warm up even the coldest of souls
